attributes.action: launch a full enquiry into the circumstances of Ian Tomlinson's death seperate to the IPCC investigation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to the new evidence being shown in the press of the circumstances of Ian Tomlinson's death we urge the Prime Minister to step in now to immediately bring the truth to light.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "launch a full enquiry into the circumstances of Ian Tomlinson's death seperate to the IPCC investigation."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20504


Prime Minister's Office
